snippet: Mitch McConnell, the Senate Republican leader, on Tuesday disclosed plans to file a friend-of-the-court brief in a case in which a company challenged an order issued by the National Labor Relations Board.
abstract: Mitch McConnell, the Senate Republican leader, on Tuesday disclosed plans to file a friend-of-the-court brief in a case in which a company challenged an order issued by the National Labor Relations Board.

headline.main: Senate Republicans Announce Plan to Support Challenge to Recess Appointments
